title: Travelling by bus? We're near the line! 3 br / 2 ba!

posting_body: ['Emerald Pointe Apartment Homes', 'Featured Floorplan: 3-bed / 2-bath / 1235 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $1322 - $1629', 'Deposit: Call', 'show contact info', 'Description: Emerald Pointe delivers large 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartment homes for rent in Clayton County.', 'French doors open onto private patios or balconies in this great location just minutes from downtown Atlanta.', 'Lease Terms: 6-Month, 12-Month', 'Pet Policy: Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions 25lbs.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Apartment Amenities:', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Frost-Free Refrigerator', '◾ Range', '◾', 'Tub/Shower', '◾ Wall to Wall Carpeting', '◾ Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '◾ Eat-in Kitchen', '◾ Private Patio or Balcony', '◾ Vinyl Flooring', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '◾ Window Coverings', 'Community Features:', '◾ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service', '◾ Controlled Access', '◾ Grill', '◾ Maintenance on site', '◾ Online Services', '◾', 'On-Site Management', '◾ Playground', '◾ Sparkling Swimming Pool', '◾ Sun Deck', '◾ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '◾ Clothes Care Center/Laundry Facilities', '◾ Convenient Online Rental Payments', '◾ Convenient to Hospital & Medical Facilities', '◾ Easy Access to Airport & Interstate Highways', '◾ Lush, Professionally Maintained Landscaping', '◾ Minutes from Southlake Mall & Shopping', '◾ Monthly Pest Control', '◾ Package Service', '◾ Resident Referral Program', 'Call us:', 'show contact info', '501 Roberts Dr', 'Riverdale, GA 30274', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '981FE7B78EC149B6']
